title: Sure! I’m for the New Deal – I.M.A. SIMP (American pin, 1940)
Text: Sure! I’m for the New Deal – I.M.A. SIMP.
Additional Information: Pin attacking President Roosevelt and the New Deal. Issued as part of Republican Wendell Willkie’s presidential campaign, the pin shows the grinning character of ‘Ima Simp’ (meaning ‘simpleton’), implying that supporters of Roosevelt and the New Deal are somewhat dim.
